{
    "maxEmptyLines": 2,
    "trailingCommas": true
}
---
module.exports = {         
    colors :[ "red" ,"green" ,"blue" ],
        name :'esfmt',
    doSomething(){
    // some comment
        return   'I said, "hi!"'
    },
    [ again ] ( ) {
        return "yo"
    },
}




    let name = "Nicholas";
const x = {
    name,
    [ baz ] : "boom",
    *doSomething  () {
        // noop
    },
    async   doSomethingElse( ) {
        await foo()
    }
}
---
module.exports = {
    colors: ["red", "green", "blue"],
    name: "esfmt",
    doSomething() {
        // some comment
        return "I said, \"hi!\"";
    },
    [again]() {
        return "yo";
    },
};


let name = "Nicholas";
const x = {
    name,
    [baz]: "boom",
    *doSomething() {
        // noop
    },
    async doSomethingElse() {
        await foo();
    },
};
